snippet.title: Dragonkin: The Banished | Early Access Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Start your adventure in Dragonkin: The Banished with a 20% launch discount: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1863430/Dragonkin_The_Banished/

Dragonkin: The Banished launches today in Steam Early Access! Fans of Hack & Slash games and ARPGs can experience the start of the hunt to take down the Dragon Lords. Expand your abilities using the Ancestral Grid, loot Mythic gear, level up your Wyrmlings, and dive into the end-game modes. 

Dragonkin: The Banished will be launched in Early Access and we’ll be building the game alongside our community. Player feedback will be crucial in shaping the future development of the game with several updates planned that will bring new content, a new hero, new abilities, new zones, and more! 

Dragonkin: The Banished is out now in Early Access on Steam!
------------------------------- 
Learn more about Dragonkin: 
Game Page ► https://www.nacongaming.com/dragonkin-the-banished
